Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AimAction
    Class that allows Sniper to aim at a target.
    Ammunition
    Item to represent bullet for guns.
    AmmunitionBox
    Portable item contains an amount of ammunition.
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    AttackAction
    Special game.Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    Building
    Abstract class represents Building in this game.
    ChantBehaviour
    Class extends from Behaviour allows Actor to do chant action.
    ChooseTargetAction
    An action class allows Player to choose and lock at a target within the range.
    ChooseWeaponAction
    Class represent Ranged Weapon available in Player's inventory.
    CraftAction
    Action to allow the Player to craft a weapon.
    Crop
    A crop sowed by Farmer that will grow to become food
    CureBehaviour
    A class that allows a Doctor to cure.
    Depot
    Class represents Depot that stores Ammunition.
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    Doctor
    A Doctor.
    EatAction
    Action to allow Actor to eat
    EatBehaviour
    A class that allows a Human or Farmer to eat a food.
    Farmer
    A Farmer.
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FertiliseBehaviour
    A class that allows a Farmer to fertilise a crop.
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    Food
    An edible item which can heal player and damaged humans
    HarvestAction
    Action to allow the Player/Farmer to harvest a crop.
    HarvestBehaviour
    A class that allows Farmer/Player to harvest a ripen crop nearby
    Hospital
    A hospital building.
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HumanCorpse
    A Human corpse.
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    InjectVaccineAction
    Action for Doctor inject vaccine into Humans.
    Lane
    A class that represents lane road.
    MamboMarie
    A class represents a character in this game.
    NewWorld
    A class extends from the World to make this game more extensible.
    PickUpBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to pick up an item.
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    QuitGameAction
    Action to allow the Player to quit the game.
    RangedAttackAction
    Action for Player to use guns for ranged attack.
    RangedWeapon  
    ScreamBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to say something.
    ShotDirectionAction
    Action for Player to shoot in a specific direction.
    Shotgun
    A ranged weapon.
    SniperRifle
    A type of ranged weapon.
    SowBehaviour
    A class that allows a Farmer to sow a crop on a dirt
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    Vehicle
    An item for Player to move between town map and compound map
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Zombie
    A Zombie.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieClub
    A weapon item crafted from Zombie's arms
    ZombieLimbs
    A primary weapon item from Zombie's limbs
    ZombieMace
    A weapon item crafted from Zombie's legs
